title: One Size Does Not Fit All: A Grounded Theory and Online Survey Study of Developer Preferences for Security Warning Types
questions: Where, when and how to present security warnings to developers?

title: Lessons Learned from Using an Online Platform to Conduct Large-Scale, Online Controlled Security Experiments with Software Developers
questions: In order to allow for distributed recruitment of IT professionals for security user studies, the researchers designed Developer Observatory, a browser-based virtual laboratory platform that enables controlled programming experiments while retaining most of the observational power of lab studies. In this paper, the researchers share their experiences using this platform.
